description: Matty Lund scores the winner for Salford as they beat Morecambe and move into the League Two play-off places
title: Salford City 1-0 Morecambe
maintext:
Salford City beat Morecambe 3-1 in this exact fixture last season, as many wins as in their first four encounters in the Football League (D1 L2).
Morecambe have lost on each of their previous two trips to Salford in the Football League, losing 2-1 in November 2020 as well as the aforementioned result last season.
After winning their final Football League game of the year on each of the first four occasions since 2019, Salford lost 3-0 to Grimsby Town in 2023.
Morecambe are winless on the last five occasions their final Football League game of the year has been away from home (D2 L3), failing to score in the last three such games.
